responses: Sure, go ahead and ask your question.

patterns: Who is the team behind this?
responses: The developer of Sebasty. Their team includes Jurado, Luig, Brillantes, Gaylon, and Jaguit.
Here are your stocks!

patterns: Where can I give my feedback about the school?
responses: You can give it to me! Kindly click on the "Feedback" section at the top right corner of the screen, fill out the form, and submit it. I will process it so that it reaches the administration. Alternatively, you can go to the department you have concerns with and inform the officer in charge about the concerns you have.

patterns: Where can I get details about the events of the school?
responses:
You can see event details or announcements on the official social media accounts of San Sebastian College - Recollectos de Cavite. Just search San Sebastian College - Recollectos de Cavite on Facebook to look at their main page and see if there are any posted details. You can also search for the following sites depending on your concern:

IDENTITY, FORMATION AND MISSION DIVISION:
- Baste Cavite - Student affairs
- Baste Cavite - Campus Ministry Office
- Baste Cavite - Student Development and Placement Center
- Baste Cavite - Health Services

ACADEMIC AND RESEARCH:
- Baste Cavite - Registrar
- Baste Cavite - Admission and Scholarships
- Baste Cavite - Cañacao Campus
- Baste Cavite - Senior High School
- Baste Cavite - Office of the College Dean
- Baste Cavite - Graduate School
- Baste Cavite - Libraries
- Baste Cavite - CRCW
- Baste Cavite - LMS

FINANCE DIVISION:
- Baste Cavite - Finance
- Baste Cavite - Bookstore

Understood. Feel free to ask again in a different way.

patterns: Who is the head of the school?
Who is the top official of the school?
responses: REV. FR. RAFAEL B. PECSON, OAR

patterns: Who is in charge of the college?
responses: JENNIFER B. ESCOBAR, MAT

patterns: Where is San Sebastian College - Recoletos de Cavite located?
Can you tell me the address of SSCRdC?
What is the location of SSCRdC?
responses:
Main Campus: Manila-Cavite Road, Sta. Cruz, Cavite City, 4100, Philippines
Cañacao Campus: Padre Burgos St., Bo. Rosario, San Roque, Cavite City, 4100, Philippines

patterns: Can you tell me the location of the gymnasium?
How do I get to the gymnasium?
responses: You can find the gymnasium at the Cañacao Campus located on Padre Burgos St., Bo. Rosario, San Roque, Cavite City, 4100, Philippines. If you plan to take a jeepney to get there, look for the one with a 'PN' placard.

patterns: Where can I pay my tuition?
How do I settle my tuition?
Where is the tuition fee payment?
Where can I pay for my fees
responses: You can pay your tuition fee or other fees at the cashier located in the Saint Augustine Lobby or SA Lobby.

patterns: Where can I see how much my tuition is?
How do I check my tuition fee?
Can I know the amount of my tuition fee?
responses: You can view the updated tuition fees for different courses, which are posted on the bulletin board located between the Accounting Office and Finance Office. Alternatively, you can directly inquire about them at the cashier's office.

patterns: What is the functionality of Sebasty?
responses: Sebasty is powered by rechargeable batteries and can be controlled or not by CCC or an Admin. It is responsible for encoding and updating details about the school's latest activities.

The available courses at San Sebastian College - Recoletos de Cavite are:
- BS Hospitality Management
- BS Tourism Management
- BSBA Financial Management
- BSBA Marketing Management
- BS Information Technology
- BS Computer Engineering
- BS Electronics Engineering
- BS Industrial Engineering
- BS Psychology
- BS Accountancy
- BS Communication
- BS Nursing
- BS Criminology
